document_title: Ovarian functional cysts: Causes, signs and treatments
subsection_content:
Dr. Kim Ngan recommends that although there is no way to prevent functional ovarian cysts, women can detect them early, monitor them and treat them effectively if they comply with regular gynecological examinations. month/time.
At the same time, women need to "listen" to their bodies, pay attention to abnormalities in the menstrual cycle each month including cycle time, menstrual symptoms... for early detection, effective treatment, and avoidance. dangerous complications.
Obstetrics and Gynecology Center, Tam Anh General Hospital System brings together a team of excellent Obstetrics and Gynecology experts, with many years of experience in examining, diagnosing and treating complex gynecological diseases; Equipped with modern machinery systems, especially state-of-the-art ultrasound systems such as 2D, 3D, 4D ultrasound machines, color Doppler ultrasound, the latest generation Voluson E10 ultrasound... to support main diagnostic results accurately, contributing to optimal treatment effectiveness, caring for and protecting the health and happiness of women.
For advice and to schedule an examination with Obstetrics and Gynecology experts at Tam Anh General Hospital System, please contact:
Most cases of functional ovarian cysts resolve on their own and do not require treatment. However, some cases cause dangerous complications that require immediate treatment. Therefore, when diagnosed with functional ovarian cysts, women need to follow the doctor's instructions for close monitoring and timely, highly effective treatment!

nang co nang buong trung.json. Preventive measures for functional ovarian cysts
Dr. Kim Ngan recommends that although there is no way to prevent functional ovarian cysts, women can detect them early, monitor them and treat them effectively if they comply with regular gynecological examinations. month/time.
At the same time, women need to "listen" to their bodies, pay attention to abnormalities in the menstrual cycle each month including cycle time, menstrual symptoms... for early detection, effective treatment, and avoidance. dangerous complications.
